column1: A funeral service will be held at 10:00 A.M. on Tuesday
column4: at Zieren Funeral Home in Carlyle with Rev. Tom Hoffman
column5: officiating. Interment will follow at McKendree Chapel Cemetery near Keyesport. Visitation will be held at Zieren Funeral Home on Monday
